response.overview: "The Game" is a horny game that Adele plays with a few guys who know how to play billiards very well ... and other things too. In "The Boat of Love" a guy and two girls throw their own private party during a pleasure trip. In "Designing" a female fashion designer "inspects" two of her models. In "The Same Color" three executives have the chance to see that the color of the carpeting is the same as their boss' wife's underwear, and one of them is the boss himself. In "Jacuzzi" two guys find out that you can also fuck at a jacuzzi. In "Road Story" you will be able to see how a fantastic blonde enjoys herself on American Roads.
response.title: Triple X Files 3: Adele
